description: A grip hook with wrapped handle for better grip and two additional hooks welded on to make it into a better makeshift weapon.

//: The claws cannot penetrate harder armor without the mass of a deathclaw behind it.
description: A deadly weapon made with a severed deathclaw hand. The claws can easily tear through lightly armored opponents. The hand is deskinned and all joints are kept straight with metal plates and screws. Straps and a handle are added to secure the weapon on the hand. It's as much of a trophy as it is a weapon.

A deadly weapon made with a severed mantis foreleg. The durable chitinous point can easily pierce through lightly armored opponents. All joints are kept straight with metal plates and screws. The femur is hollowed out to allow an arm to fit through, and a handle is added to secure the weapon on the hand.

A deadly weapon made with a severed Yao Guai hand. The claws can easily tear through lightly armored opponents. The hand is deskinned and all joints are kept straight with metal plates and screws. Straps and a handle are added to secure the weapon on the hand.

A pair of simple boxing gloves, meant to pad attacks so you don't kill people or hurt yourself. Contrary to this original purpose, these ones have metal plates inserted in them, allowing for some brutal punches.

An armored gauntlet with a pneumatic ram. It was used both in construction as a demolition tool and in police and military for bashing down doors. The pneumatic ram is driven by a piston system powered by plutonium cells.

A wrist-mounted shotgun with a pressure plate worn over the knuckles. The impact of the plate triggers the firing mechanism when a punch connects with the target. Even with internal recoil dampeners, a strong arm is still needed to be able to withstand the recoil of a 12 gauge shell. The pressure plate is reinforced so that it can be used as an effective punching weapon if ammunition is depleted.

A mechanical glove with a circular saw blade mounted on the back. Although intended for use in cutting a variety of materials, this tool has seen use in the post-catalcysm world as a very effective unarmed weapon, especially against most armors. It requires batteries to operate the rotating circular saw.

use_action.msg: The industrial hand's saw whirrs to life!
use_action.need_charges_msg: The industrial hand's saw remains inert. It needs more power to function.

//: Half of cutting damage of chainsaw since it's a much smaller blade, but compensates for able to penetrate armor
description: A mechanical glove with a circular saw blade mounted on the back. Originally intended for use in cutting a variety of materials, this tool has seen use in the post-war world as a very effective unarmed weapon, especially against most armors. It requires batteries to operate the rotating circular saw. It is currently active.

A blue and yellow-colored metal gauntlet consisting of a rubber glove with a contact-based electrode plate placed on the glove's fingers connected to a metal housing for electronics. When active, it can punch and shock opponents at the same time. It requires batteries to generate the shock.

use_action.msg: You press a button and the zap glove emits a low hum.

description: A blue and yellow-colored metal gauntlet consisting of a rubber glove with a contact-based electrode plate placed on the glove's fingers connected to a metal housing for electronics. When active, it can punch and shock opponents at the same time. It requires batteries to generate the shock. It is currently active.

use_action.msg: You press a button and the zap glove turns off.

description: A crude hand to hand weapon consisting of jagged metal blades affixed to thick leather straps.
